solution_line_template: 2 apples cut into 8 slices each is {num_apples}*{slices_per_apple}=<<{num_apples}*{slices_per_apple}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} slices
2/8ths of the apple slices is {total_slices}*{fraction_given_to_jerry}={slices_given_to_jerry} slices
Tom then ate half the slices so he has {remaining_slices_after_jerry}/{half_divisor}=<<{remaining_slices_after_jerry}/{half_divisor}={final_slices_left}>>{final_slices_left} slices
